text: Saint-Luc is a village and former municipality of the district of Sierre in the canton of Valais in Switzerland. On 1 January 2009, the former municipalities of Saint-Luc, Ayer, Chandolin, Grimentz, Saint-Jean and Vissoie merged into the new municipality of Anniviers. Category:Former municipalities of Valais Category:Villages in Valais
title: Saint-Luc, Switzerland
